question:
You have seen an advertisement from a couple, who live in Australia, for someone to teach their two children your language for a year.Write a letter to the couple. In your letter

explain why you think you would be suitable for the jobsay what else you could do for the familygive reasons for wanting the job
text: I am writing this letter with regards to you about the advertisement which posted recently. I hope this job is still available.

Let me briefly introduce myself. My name is Yan and I am a native Burmese speaker as well as a certified  teacher. Currently, I am studying part-time at a university near your town for  further studies. I have a few years of teaching experience, especially, kids before I came here. I hope these facts would be suitable for this job.

I will be available on weekends for both online and physical classes. I have plenty of interesting strategies to teach your kids about my native language. Moreover, I can share our history, culture and stories.
I would be very grateful if I get this job because teaching is one of my hobbies and I can get extra income for my expenses.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
